#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(){
long long int t,n,m,k,d,a,b,p;

	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
            cin>>n;
    cin>>m;
   k=(n-(n/2))*(m/2)+(m-(m/2))*(n/2);

             d=m*n;
             a=k;b=d;
             while(b!=0){
                p=b;
                b=a%b;
                a=p;
             }

        cout<<k/a<<"/"<<d/a<<endl;
}}
